sentence: The only negative about the lounge is the selection of entrees in the evening
As for the hotel itself I was there when they were renovating and so the lobby bar was moved to the 3rd floor and IMO lost a little of the feel of the lobby bar
There are also happy hours a tea time happy hour and a bar happy hour on the 26th floor
A quick checkin checkout might give the hotel traveler more brownie points
Restaurant staff need training
Spent 3 days at Plaza Anethe Hotel on business utilising it is conference lunch and accommodation facilities and services
They have separate corner having Indian breakfast
They have a large buffet breakfast in the morning or you can opt for their bakery
Stayed 3 nights for meeting training where meals and refreshments were inclusive

When we asked the front desk staff for recommendations for dinner since everyone is too lazy to venture out of the hotel on our first day both Woranut and Napat introduced and shared with us the restaurants all at Level 3 available in the hotel
Breakfast buffet is generous in variety

But the show stopper was my friend became very ill and was staying on the 16th floor and the housekeeper noted he was not feeling well not only ensured there was not anything he needed but sent him soup flowers and other just amazingly thoughtful gestures of someone who truly cares
Beautuful place and excellent services of the member club reception restaurants bell service and maids with great service mind

They all make a great team and we look forward to seeing them againThe consistently high great and friendly service from the Athene staff excellent location near BTS shopping great rooms and restaurant make the Athene Hotel our favorite
Amazing dinner moment
The food was really nice and lovely with seafood and dessert particularly
Thank you so much for making my visit to the restaurant a memorable one
it is close to shopping centers and fine dining restaurant

Super friendly staff and the breakfast was one of the best and the most varied I´ve ever got and I travel a lotI also liked a location which is not too busy and good selection of other restaurants within walking distance
The Athene is the best hotel providing lunch box and dinner take away for all guest
